cast.name: 洛乌·卡斯特尔 Lou Castel
马尔科·达莫雷 Marco D'Amore
维尼乔·马尔基奥尼 Vinicio Marchioni

introduction: Many of us dream of living in a different country, but the reality of making it work is often much harder than the dream. Drive Me Home is the heartfelt story of two young men who grew up in a small town in Sicily and always dreamt of living a completely different life abroad. As the years passed, Antonio and Agostino lost touch. After reconnecting as adults, they discover they have both fulfilled their childhood fantasy to move away, and in fact have been living near each other in Belgium. After some soul-searching, the pair decides to travel back to their hometown together. Drive Me Home is the touching tale about self-discovery, reconciliation, adventure, and the importance of remembering where we come from.
